translations.chinese: 於是少年豪吏如蕭、曹、樊噲等皆為收沛子 弟，得三千人。
translations.english: So the young brave officials like Xiao, Cao, Fan Kuai, and others all recruited young men from Pei and gathered three thousand.

translations.chinese: 是月，項梁與兄子羽起吳。
translations.english: In this month, Xiang Liang and his brother's son Yu rose up in Wu.

translations.chinese: 田儋與從弟榮、橫起齊，自立為齊王。
translations.english: Tian Dan and his younger brothers Rong and Heng rose up in Qi, establishing themselves as King of Qi.
Han Guang established himself as King of Yan.
Wei Jiu established himself as King of Wei.
